Name.label: Rare developmental defect with skin/mucosae involvement
Genetic multiple congenital anomalies/dysmorphic syndrome without intellectual disability
Multiple congenital anomalies/dysmorphic syndrome without intellectual disability
Autosomal ichthyosis syndrome with other associated signs

TextSection.Contents: Ichthyosis-oral and digital anomalies syndrome is characterised by ichthyosis, unusual facies (small mouth with a thin upper lip and lower lip with a midline groove) and digital anomalies (tapered fingers with a lack of distal flexion creases and wide spacing between the second and third fingers). It has been described in two sibs born to first cousin parents. Transmission appears to be autosomal recessive.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
